header.title: About template
header.content:
What is this?

This is a NodeJS / Express template for Rest API that you can use so that you don't have to do things over and over again that are universal.

Features

  • User authorization (Login/Registration/Password reset)
  • Users CRUD
  • File upload
  • Image compression
  • Pagination
  • Joi for validation and error messages
  • Filters
